item.title: They really give me ~700$ for free...
item.description:
The handshake organization donated $10.2MM and is giving away free HNS (can be exchanged into BTC). I tried it my self, and got ~700$ for free (except an unused ssh key).

The tutorial is available at: Zhihu. I would recommend you to use an out-dated ssh key for verification (I’m using one from DM2, which has not been used for more than 6 months, according to Github). I delete that key after this process and generate a new one.

Notes:

  • For error message gyp: No Xcode or CLT version detected!, xcode-select --install works for me.
  • For error message Xcode-select: error: invalid developer directory..., directly delete the directory and run xcode-select --install works for me.
  • I set fee to 0.1.
  • If you want to use okex as the bitcoin wallet, here is my referral link: https://www.okex.com/join/1881643 (you can use it to cash out to your mainland account).
